title: Chocolate Oat Squares
ingredients: ['225g butter, softened', '450g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '285g porridge oats', '310g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 (397g) tin condensed sweetened milk', '30g butter', '340g plain chocolate chips', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '120g chopped walnuts', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
